definition: being or characteristic of or appropriate to everyday language, the everyday speech of the people (as distinguished from literary language)
details:
adjective
- being or characteristic of or appropriate to everyday language
= synonyms: vulgar
noun
- the everyday speech of the people (as distinguished from literary language)
- a characteristic language of a particular group (as among thieves)
= synonyms: cant, jargon, patois, slang, lingo, argot
